chinese: 以信任；盼望，希望m委托
当你攀爬时，你必须信任你的搭档。
english: When you climb, you should trust your partner

chinese: 2. 预算 凶预算，安排 adi.廉价的
度假之前，这对情侣做了个基本预算。
english: Before going on vacation, the couple wrote out a basic budget

chinese: n.冰山
泰坦尼克号撞上了那座冰山，真是太不幸了。
english: It's too bad that the Titanic hit that iceberg

chinese: v.垄断；独占，全部占有
这家公司已经垄断了冰茶市场。
english: This company has monopolized the ice tea market

chinese: 以关上，闭上
请把门关上。
V.给••注射；注入；投入（资金）
医生一边给患者注射抗生素一边问。
english: the doctor asked as she injected her patient with antibiotics

chinese: 1，委员会：全体委员
委员会成员代表着他们各自的组织来开会做决议。
english: The committee members come together to make decisions for the group they represent

chinese: 1人道主义者：慈善家；博爱主义者adh.人道主义者的；慈善的；博爱的
她是一位著名的人道主义者，奉献其一生来帮即穷人。
english: She's a well-known humanitarian who devotes her life to help the poor

chinese: n. 岛
这个小岛上有几所房屋和一些树。
english: The small isle contained a few houses and some trees

chinese: ad（疾病）慢性的；积习难改的；（问题）顽固的
我被慢性疼痛所困扰。
n.出现；来临，到来
石器工具的出现增强了人类捕猎的能力。
english: The advent of stone tools enhanced the hunting abilities of humans

chinese: n，遗迹；边角剩料
他们现在看到的是当年一座大城堡的遗迹。
english: They are looking at the remnants of what was once a huge castle

chinese: v.涂，敷；申请
如果你要长时间待在太阳下，一定别忘记涂防晒霜。
english: Don't forget to apply sunscreen if you spend time out in the sun

chinese: n. 福利
这个组织旨在提升动物福利。
english: The organization aims to improve the welfare of animals

chinese: Y滑倒，跌落n.溜走
地板很湿，请注意不要滑倒。
english: The floor is wet, make sure you don't slip and fall

chinese: n.嗜好，沉溺，放纵
每当感到有压力时，他就放纵自己吃一两块蛋糕。
english: Whenever he feels stressed, he allows himself the indulgence of cake or two
